HibachiService Class

Module: Hibachi

HibachiService

is a part of Hibachi, the framework that Slatwall is build on.

  • Index
  • Methods
  • Properties

onMissingCountMethod

(
  • missingMethodName
  • missingMethodArguments
)

Provides dynamic count methods, by convention, on missing method:

countXXX()

...in which XXX is an ORM entity name.

Parameters:

  • missingMethodName String
  • missingMethodArguments Struct

onMissingExportMethod

(
  • missingMethodName
  • missingMethodArguments
)

Provides dynamic export methods, by convention, on missing method:

exportXXX()

...in which XXX is an ORM entity name.

Parameters:

  • missingMethodName String
  • missingMethodArguments Struct

onMissingGetMethod

(
  • missingMethodName
  • missingMethodArguments
)

Provides dynamic get methods, by convention, on missing method:

AND here is case sensetive to avoid matching in property name i.e brand

...in which XXX is an ORM entity name, and YYY is an entity property name.

Note: Ordered arguments only--named arguments not supported.

Parameters:

  • missingMethodName String
  • missingMethodArguments Struct

Returns:

void

Example:

    getXXX( required any ID, boolean isReturnNewOnNotFound = false )

    getXXXByYYY( required any yyyFilterValue, boolean isReturnNewOnNotFound = false )

     getXXXByYYYAndZZZ( required array [yyyFilterValue,zzzFilterValue], boolean isReturnNewOnNotFound = false )

onMissingGetSmartListMethod

(
  • missingMethodName
  • missingMethodArguments
)

Provides dynamic getSmarList method, by convention, on missing method:

Parameters:

  • missingMethodName String
  • missingMethodArguments Struct

Example:

         getXXXSmartList( struct data )

...in which XXX is an ORM entity name

NOTE: Ordered arguments only--named arguments not supported.

onMissingListMethod

(
  • missingMethodName
  • missingMethodArguments
)

Provides dynamic list methods, by convention, on missing method:

NOTE: Ordered arguments only--named arguments not supported.

Parameters:

  • missingMethodName String
  • missingMethodArguments Struct

Example:

listXXX( struct filterCriteria, string sortOrder, struct options )
listXXXFilterByYYY( required any yyyFilterValue, string sortOrder, struct options )
listXXXOrderByZZZ( struct filterCriteria, struct options )
listXXXFilterByYYYOrderByZZZ( required any yyyFilterValue, struct options )

...in which XXX is an ORM entity name, and YYY and ZZZ are entity property names.

onMissingListXXXFilterByYYYMethod

(
  • missingMethodName
  • missingMethodArguments
)

Provides dynamic list method, by convention, on missing method:

listXXXFilterByYYY( required any yyyFilterValue, string sortOrder, struct options )

...in which XXX is an ORM entity name, and YYY is an entity property name.

NOTE: Ordered arguments only--named arguments not supported.

Parameters:

  • missingMethodName String
  • missingMethodArguments Struct

(
  • missingMethodName
  • missingMethodArguments
)

Provides dynamic list method, by convention, on missing method: listXXXFilterByYYYOrderByZZZ( required any yyyFilterValue, struct options )

...in which XXX is an ORM entity name, and YYY and ZZZ are entity property names.

NOTE: Ordered arguments only--named arguments not supported.

Parameters:

  • missingMethodName String
  • missingMethodArguments Struct

(
  • missingMethodName
  • missingMethodArguments
)

Provides dynamic list method, by convention, on missing method:

listXXXOrderByZZZ( struct filterCriteria, struct options )

...in which XXX is an ORM entity name, and ZZZ is an entity property name.

NOTE: Ordered arguments only--named arguments not supported.

Parameters:

  • missingMethodName String
  • missingMethodArguments Struct

onMissingMethod

(
  • missingMethodName
  • missingMethodArguments
)

Generic ORM CRUD methods and dynamic methods by convention via onMissingMethod. See all onMissing* method comments and other method signatures for usage. Credit: Heavily influenced by ColdSpring 2.0-pre-alpha's coldspring.orm.hibernate.AbstractGateway. So, thank you Mark Mandel and Bob Silverberg :)

Provides dynamic methods, by convention, on missing method:
  • newXXX()
  • countXXX()
  • saveXXX( required any xxxEntity )
  • deleteXXX( required any xxxEntity )
  • getXXX( required any ID, boolean isReturnNewOnNotFound = false )
  • getXXXByYYY( required any yyyFilterValue, boolean isReturnNewOnNotFound = false )
  • getXXXByYYYANDZZZ( required array [yyyFilterValue,zzzFilterValue], boolean isReturnNewOnNotFound = false )
And

Here is case sensetive to avoid matching in property name i.e brand

  • listXXX( struct filterCriteria, string sortOrder, struct options )
  • listXXXFilterByYYY( required any yyyFilterValue, string sortOrder, struct options )
  • listXXXOrderByZZZ( struct filterCriteria, struct options )
  • listXXXFilterByYYYOrderByZZZ( required any yyyFilterValue, struct options )
...in which XXX is an ORM entity name, and YYY and ZZZ are entity property names. exportXXX() Note:

Ordered arguments only--named arguments not supported.

Parameters:

  • missingMethodName String
  • missingMethodArguments Struct

Returns:

any

save

(
  • target
)

The default save method will populate, validate, and if not errors delegate to the DAO where entitySave() is called.*

Parameters:

  • target Required

Returns:

target
